summary.span: 表示 值的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类的成员的行为如中所述完全， ，并文档，不同之处在于此实现将引发如果尝试插入`null`到集合。Members of this class behave exactly as described by the , , and documentation, except that this implementation throws an if you attempt to insert `null` into the collection. **Freezable 功能：** 从继承，因此类，类提供多种特殊功能：可以声明对象，为在多个对象，变为只读以提高之间共享性能、 克隆以及变为线程安全。**Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the class, the class provides several special features: objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe. 有关所提供的不同功能的详细信息对象，请参阅[Freezable 对象概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For more information about the different features provided by objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreKInt32Values**oneOrMoreKInt32Values* 一个或多个值，每个对都由一个逗号和/或一个或多个空格分隔：One or more values, with each pair delimited by a single comma and/or one or more spaces: *[delimeter* *]\** *[delimeter* *]\** 例如，`"5 10 43"`和`"5,10,43"`都有效。For example, `"5 10 43"` and `"5,10,43"` are both valid.
